It was introduced in 1926 as a companion make for GM's more expensive line of Oakland automobiles. Pontiac quickly overtook Oakland in ...

t: 75 Years of Pontiac: The Official History: Gunnell, John: 9780873492300: Amazon.com: Books
s: This is a great book for Pontiac fans. I do miss Pontiac as a brand. This book is great for collectors and fans of Pontiac. I wonder what the story would be like today if Pontiac had lived? I enjoyed reading about the brands triumphs and background. I liked the photos used as well.
